title: Realmeâ€™s first 150W fast-charging phone lands in India
content:
At a launch event in India today, Realme finally lifted the covers off its first 150W fast-charging smartphone — the Realme GT Neo 3. Realme’s latest affordable flagship packs MediaTek’s Dimensity 8100 5G chipset and it comes in two variants featuring different battery capacities and fast-charging capabilities. Here’s everything you need to know about the

The post Realme’s first 150W fast-charging phone lands in India appeared first on XDA.
description: Realme today launched its first 150W fast-charging phone, the Realme GT Neo 3, in the Indian market. Read on to learn more.
